ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class PictureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.FileIO
      • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.PictureManager

  • public class PictureManager
extends FileIO
    This is a manager for photos, the images will actually be stored in the elastic search online. This Model will store the local JSON string of the images and downloaded JSON strings of images online.

      • addImageToJsonFile

        public java.lang.String addImageToJsonFile(java.lang.String imageJsonString,
                                  User userToGetInstallationId,
                                  Context context)
        Saves a given base64 encoded image into a file with a unique filename that becomes that image's image ID.
        Parameters:
        imageJsonString - The base64 encoded image as a string
        userToGetInstallationId - The user's android ID
        context -
        Returns:
        the image ID of that image, which is the file name of the saved base64 image as well.

      • loadImageJsonFromJsonFile

        public static java.lang.String loadImageJsonFromJsonFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                         Context context)
                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This static method retrieves the base64 encoded image as a string from the saved base64 encoded image that is stored on the user's device in the application folder.
        Returns:
        a string containing the byteArray of the bitmap encoded as a string in Base64.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Returns:
        the base64 encoded string.

      • manualDownloadPhoto

        public Bitmap manualDownloadPhoto(Game game)
        Manually force download the image from the network even if settings is set to don't download images.
        Parameters:
        game - The game that contains the image you want to force download.
        Returns:
        the bitmap from that game.

        Returns:
        the estimated file size.

      • makeImageSmaller

        public static Bitmap makeImageSmaller(Bitmap image)
        This static method takes a Bitmap and resizes it until it's estimated filesize is smaller than the PictureManager's MAXSIZE value. That smaller image will then be returned.
        Parameters:
        image -
        Returns:
        The resized Bitmap image.
